name: Boogeyman vr
description:
" GAMEPAD needed to play "

Use your flashlight to ward off the Boogeyman.
Your battery will only last so long. Conserve as much power as you can by relying more on the sounds around you.
Enjoy the best game and VR experience PlayStore with your Google Cardboard.
You 'll be able to complete the five nights without getting caught boogeyman ? Every night is different with more difficulty and meteorilogicos and IA changes.
